TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimeSpanValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确保对象符合特定条件。The class is used to ensure that a object meets specific criteria. 包含两个参数的构造函数可确保最小值和最多值，将遵守。The constructor with two parameters ensures that both a minimum and a maximum value are adhered to. 带有三个参数的构造函数检查的最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否独占。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 具有四个参数构造函数将检查前面三个参数外，还检查是否值等于特定的秒数。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific number of seconds. 方法确定要验证的对象类型是否与预期的类型相匹配。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在验证的对象传递的参数作为方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数检查的最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否独占。The constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 当`rangeIsExclusive`参数设置为`true`，则值不能之间`minValue`和`maxValue`值。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`resolutionInSeconds`指定参数，则对象正在验证必须等于此值才能通过验证。When the `resolutionInSeconds` parameter is specified, the object being validated must be equal to this value in order to pass validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含验证所需的规则对象。The object contains the rules necessary to validate a object. 实例时建立规则创建类。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要验证的对象作为参数传递方法。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
